Posts.Content: Jun 16, 2013 10:24PM Debi0105 wrote: Me, diagnosed stage IV in 2005 with 7.5 cm tumor in my LB, Chemo shrank it 40% and I had a partial mastectomy and radiation, i think 33 treatments. they found it in 1 of 27 lymph nodes. In 2009 I had metastasis to spine T12 and left shoulder. I had a kyphoplasty in my spine to repair compression fractures and 5 doses of radiation to spine and shoulder. March 3, 2013 I had surgery to remove part of my spine because the cancer was back and very close to my spinal cord. Doc was worried about paralysis.., 6 weeks later I had cyber knife radiation to the inner side of the spine. I am currently back to work and trying to get used to exemestane and afinitor
Posts.Title: How Many Are We? DivineMrsM kt1966
